title: Ṣetọrẹ si tẹmpili Orbital
heading: Pari Ẹbun Rẹ
chooseHow: Yan bi o ṣe fẹ lati pari ẹbun ti a yọkuro owo-ori rẹ:

option1.heading: Aṣayan 1: Ṣetọrẹ lori Ayelujara Bayi
option1.description: Pari ẹbun rẹ lẹsẹkẹsẹ nipa lilo kaadi kirẹditi, kaadi debiti, tabi awọn ọna isanwo ori ayelujara miiran nipasẹ onigbowo inawo ti o ni aabo wa, Aaye naa . Iwọ yoo gba iwe-ori owo-ori lẹsẹkẹsẹ.

option2.heading: Aṣayan 2: Idogo Bank si Roy Foundation
option2.description: Ṣe idogo idogo taara tabi gbigbe waya si The Roy Foundation , alabaṣepọ ilana wa ati onigbowo inawo. Aṣayan yii jẹ apẹrẹ fun awọn ẹbun nla tabi awọn gbigbe ilu okeere.
option2.instructions: Jọwọ fi " Temple Orbital - {donationType} " sinu aaye itọkasi. Lẹhin ipari gbigbe rẹ, fi imeeli ranṣẹ si wa ni sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art pẹlu awọn alaye gbigbe rẹ lati gba owo-ori rẹ.

taxInfo.heading: Tax-Deductible Fifun
taxInfo.description: Temple Orbital jẹ iṣẹ akanṣe onigbowo inawo ti The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , 501 (c) (3) agbari ti kii ṣe ere. Gbogbo awọn ifunni AMẸRIKA jẹ idinku owo-ori si iye ti ofin gba laaye.
taxInfo.questions: Awọn ibeere? Kan si wa ni gabriela.veiga@orbitaltemple.art
